MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH48 postcode area of Frankby affecting properties in Baytree Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:22pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:33pm on the 13th November 2020.
